data.message: Start and test 360 portal with demo mode: Fixed envDir issue in vite.config.ts so portal reads VITE_DEMO_MODE from root .env. Portal working on localhost:5176 with mock sessions data.
data.task: Start and test 360 portal with demo mode
data.outcome: Fixed envDir issue in vite.config.ts so portal reads VITE_DEMO_MODE from root .env. Portal working on localhost:5176 with mock sessions data.
